name: Gem Miner (2013)
description:
This is a tech test I did for an interview with a company.

Anyway, nothing worse than a game going unplayed, it's nothing special, just a very basic match 3 game that I made in a couple of days, and no Bejewelled or Candy Crush, but nevertheless it's a game, and I want to set it loose into the wild.:D

AS3
